授業目的: This course trains students in reading and writing academic articles in preparation for thesis research.
到達目標: Students will acquire the necessary skills for research and writing a thesis.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第1回: In consultation with students. Classes will be conducted face-to-face from the 1st week.
トピック.授業計画1: Readings will be determined in consultation with students. Writing assignments and in-class activities will also be decided after consultation.
